task.title: Starting a chat
task.shortdesc: You can start a chat conversation from the chat main screen or directly with an individual or group in your contact list.

taskbody.context: You can send chat messages to both users who are online and offline. However, users who are offline do not receive the message until they are online.

step.cmd: Tap the name of the contact in your Contacts list to display their person card.
Type your message and then tap Send.
Look for a response from your chat partner in the chat window.
Close the chat window when you finish chatting:

ul.li: On an iPhone, tap Active to display the Chats screen. Make sure Active shows selected, tap Edit, and then tap the red bar next to the chat to close. Tap Close to close that chat.

task.title: Starting a chat from Chat screen

step.cmd: From the main menu, tap Chat.
Click the message icon at the top of the screen.
Type the name of the person to chat with in the search field.
step.info: The directory shows the results. When you see the person to chat with, tap their name.

step.cmd: Type your message into the message field.
Tap the send icon () to send the message.

task.title: Starting a chat from your contact list

step.cmd: From the main menu, tap Contacts.
Choose a chat partner from your list of contacts or tap the plus sign to create a contact.
Tap the group the person is in and tap their name.
Tap the message icon () to open the chat screen.
Type your message into the message field.
Tap the send icon () to send the message.
